title: WTT: My T206 Wheat for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T206 Wheat for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
I picked up this gem from a fellow N54er in a trade a couple weeks ago.  I thought I'd see if I could drum up any interest in trading for T205/T206 Sovereigns, especially if I can get a HOFer in trade!  Let me know if you would like to trade!

Take Care,
Geno
